boardgame.description: Carcassonne: Gold Rush is the second title in the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Carcassonne: Around the World_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; series of tile-laying games, with each game being based on the original Carcassonne design in which players slowly create a world by placing tiles on the playing area and scoring for various features in the landscape they create._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Carcassonne: Gold Rush, players return to the 19th century in the United States when cowboys drove cattle, trappers traded with Native Americans, the first railway routes appeared, and explorers _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; that is, the players _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; sent their henchmen to gold mines to laboriously search for gold nuggets. Depending on where you place your tent, you might be able to snatch a nugget from another explorer _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; but sometimes you'll be left holding fool's gold while someone else uncovers a rich gold find..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups

listing.notes: The game: Hans im Glück (c) 2014. GERMAN EDITION! INCLUDES Mini-Expansion _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Der Sheriff_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; All game materials are still in mint condition. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.

The game is unplayed and still in shrink wrap! I will ship from Germany and I am willing to ship anywhere. Please ask me, for the shipping costs for your land. I will charge shipping at cost. Everything will be well packed. You can pay me through Paypal or bank transfer to my German bank account but any fees charged must be covered by you. If you buy more games, then I make all in one package! We have a large private collection of games. Due to space and time constraints we must rid ourselves of some of the games. Therefore, these are private sales.

Shrinkwrapped and in stock Language: English Within The Netherlands € 4,- per shipment (Kiala or DHL4you) or € 6,75 per shipment (PostNL). Shipment to Belgium by Kiala is Euro 7,50. Payment is possible by bank transfer or Paypal (costs +3%)
Played twice. Complete in excellent condition. USPS priority shipping $12. Thanks!

This is for the base game and the sheriff expansion. The base game is still shrinkwrapped. The sheriff expansion has an extra sheriff meeple. There was a minor defect in the sheriff meeple, so I was sent a new one. Comes from a smoke-free home.

Brand new, in-shrink. Item is in very good condition. I treat my games very well. If there are components inside the game they are most likely bagged in 4mm, thick bags. I will work with you to ship the most cost efficient way or however you prefer. When I ship things I take extra measurers to mitigate any potential shipping damage. If the item is a small card game the shipping will be USPS First Class and will be around $5 total with shipping materials. Local pickup with no shipping available if you live in the Seattle area.
